game.name: CYPHER DUNGEON
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Custom Volume Controls, Keyboard Only Option, Playable without Timed Input, Save Anytime, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: 식별자 = ZERO. 위치 = 미확인 시스템. 목표 = 생존, 암호 해독, 탈출. 암호가 핵심이다. 사망은 절차다. 작전이 시작된다.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Identifier = ZERO. Localization = unknown system. Objectives = survive, decrypt, escape. Codes are key. Death is protocol. The sequence begins now.
